name: Random Thoughts of a Catholic Schizophrenic
name_original: Random Thoughts of a Catholic Schizophrenic
description:
This game is an interactive story on my walk to embrace God's love while battling with schizophrenia. I hope you can enjoy this short game I made. Thank you for playing!

To play:

Use the Up and Down Arrow Keys to move forwards and backwards. Or use The W to move forwards and S to move backwards.

Content warning: 

Contains topics related to mental health struggle
